awards.title: Best Student Award (岡山黒正賞)
awards.summary: The Okayama University Kokushou Award was established in honor of Professor Iwao Kokushou, who made significant contributions to the founding of Okayama University. Every year, on the day of the degree conferment ceremony, it is awarded to students who have excelled in both academics and character.
